statements: SELECT * FROM campaign_contributions WHERE contribution_amount > 1000
SELECT contributor_name, contribution_amount FROM campaign_contributions WHERE contribution_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT contributor_id, contribution_amount FROM campaign_contributions WHERE contributor_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT * FROM campaign_contributions ORDER BY contribution_date DESC
SELECT MAX(contribution_amount) AS max_contribution FROM campaign_contributions
SELECT * FROM campaign_contributions ORDER BY contribution_date DESC, contribution_amount ASC
SELECT contributor_name, contribution_amount FROM campaign_contributions WHERE contribution_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM campaign_contributions WHERE contribution_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY contribution_amount DESC
SELECT contributor_name, SUM(contribution_amount) AS total_contribution FROM campaign_contributions GROUP BY contributor_name HAVING total_contribution > 5000
SELECT contributor_name, YEAR(contribution_date) AS contribution_year FROM campaign_contributions
SELECT * FROM contributions WHERE contributor_id = 1;
SELECT contributor_name, amount FROM contributions WHERE contribution_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM expenditures WHERE expenditure_id = 2;
SELECT vendor_name, amount FROM expenditures WHERE expenditure_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT contributor_id, contributor_name, amount, contribution_date FROM contributions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT contributor_id, contributor_name, amount, contribution_date FROM contributions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY contribution_date DESC

SELECT contributor_name, amount, contribution_date FROM contributions JOIN expenditures ON contributions.contributor_id = expenditures.expenditure_id WHERE expenditure_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM contributions WHERE contributor_name LIKE '%John%' AND amount < 500 ORDER BY contributor_name
SELECT vendor_name, amount, expenditure_date FROM expenditures WHERE vendor_name = 'XYZ Corp' AND amount > 500 ORDER BY expenditure_date ASC

SELECT contributions.contributor_name, expenditure_id, vendor_name, amount FROM contributions INNER JOIN expenditures ON contributions.contributor_id = expenditures.expenditure_id WHERE amount >= 1000 ORDER BY contributor_name ASC
SELECT * FROM campaign_contributions ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM campaign_contributions WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT vendor_name, expenditure_amount FROM campaign_expenditures WHERE expenditure_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT regulation_description FROM compliance_regulations WHERE regulation_category = 'Finance';
SELECT * FROM campaign_contributions WHERE donor_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT id, donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM campaign_contributions;
SELECT * FROM campaign_expenditures WHERE expenditure_amount > 5000;
SELECT vendor_name, SUM(expenditure_amount) AS total_expenditure FROM campaign_expenditures GROUP BY vendor_name ORDER BY total_expenditure DESC;
SELECT id, donor_name, donation_amount FROM campaign_contributions WHERE donation_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 1000 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT c.id, c.donor_name, c.donation_amount, e.vendor_name, e.expenditure_amount FROM campaign_contributions c JOIN campaign_expenditures e ON c.donor_name = e.vendor_name;
SELECT * FROM contributions ORDER BY contribution_date DESC;
SELECT contributor_name, amount FROM contributions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM contributors WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT contributor_id, contributor_name, contact_information FROM contributors WHERE contributor_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM contributions ORDER BY amount DESC, contribution_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT contributor_name, amount FROM contributions JOIN contributors ON contributions.contributor_id = contributors.contributor_id WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM expenditures WHERE purpose LIKE '%marketing%' ORDER BY expenditure_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS total_contributions FROM campaigns LEFT JOIN contributions ON campaigns.campaign_id = contributions.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name;

SELECT contributor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_contributions FROM contributors LEFT JOIN contributions ON contributors.contributor_id = contributions.contributor_id GROUP BY contributor_name ORDER BY total_contributions DESC;
SELECT * FROM contributors;
SELECT contributor_id, contributor_name FROM contributors WHERE contribution_amount > 500;
SELECT contribution_date, contribution_amount FROM contributors WHERE contributor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM contributors ORDER BY contribution_amount DESC, contribution_date ASC
SELECT contributor_id, contributor_name, contribution_amount FROM contributors WHERE contribution_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM expenditures WHERE expenditure_date >= '2022-01-01' AND expenditure_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY expenditure_amount DESC
SELECT DISTINCT candidate_id, candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM candidates ORDER BY candidate_name ASC
SELECT c.campaign_name, cr.record_type, cr.record_description FROM campaigns c JOIN compliance_records cr ON c.campaign_id = cr.campaign_id WHERE cr.date_filed > '2022-01-01'
